org.jasig.cas.web
类 DelegateController

所有已实现的接口：
org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, org.springframework.context.ApplicationContextAware, org.springframework.web.context.ServletContextAware, org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.Controller
直接已知子类：
ServiceValidateController
public abstract class DelegateController
extends org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.AbstractController

Abstract class to be extended by all controllers that may become a delegate. All subclass must implement the canHandle method to say if they can handle a request or not.

从以下版本开始：
3.5
作者：
Frederic Esnault

方法详细信息

canHandle

public abstract boolean canHandle(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                  javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
Determine if a DelegateController subclass can handle the current request.

参数：
request - the current request
response - the response
返回：
true if the controller can handler the request, false otherwise
